title: Greenville issues emergency order , restricts motor vehicle travel
description: The City of Greenville declared a state of emergency and has restricted motor vehicle travel on city streets. Officials are reporting multiple wrecks and have closed the 10th Street overpass., The City of Greenville declared a state of emergency and has restricted motor vehicle travel on city streets. Officials are reporting multiple wrecks and have closed the 10th Street overpass.
